sourcesContent:
import { useState } from 'react'
import ReactCardFlip from 'react-card-flip'
import { deleteEmployee } from '../../../actions/employees'
import { Card, Container, Divider, Button, Typography, IconButton } from '@material-ui/core'
import AccountCircleIcon from '@material-ui/icons/AccountCircle'
import ArrowBackIcon from '@material-ui/icons/ArrowBack'
import useStyles from './styles'
import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'

const EmployeeCard = ({employee, edit}) => {
    const classes = useStyles()
    const [isFlipped, setIsFlipped] = useState(false)
    const [editMode, setEditMode] = useState(edit)
    const dispatch = useDispatch()

    const handleEditMode = () => {
        setIsFlipped(false)
        setEditMode((prev) => !prev)
    }

    return (
        <ReactCardFlip isFlipped={isFlipped} flipDirection='vertical'>
            <Card className={editMode ? classes.editCard : classes.card}>
                <Container className={classes.cardFrontTop}>
                    <Typography>{employee.firstName} {employee.lastName}</Typography>
                    <Divider className={classes.divider}/>
                </Container>
                <Container className={classes.cardFrontDetails}>
                    {/* {employee.positions.map((position)=> */}
                        <Typography variant="body2">{employee.positions.join(", ")}</Typography>
                    {/* )} */}
                </Container>
                <Container className={classes.flipButtonFrontArea}>
                    <IconButton style={{position: 'absolute', bottom:10}} onClick={() => setIsFlipped(true)}>
                        <AccountCircleIcon color='secondary'/>
                    </IconButton>
                </Container>
            </Card>
            <Card className={classes.cardBack} >
                <Container className={classes.cardBackContent}>
                    
                        <Typography>{employee.phoneNumber}</Typography>
                    
                        <Typography>{employee.email}</Typography>
                    
                    <IconButton style={{position: 'absolute', bottom:10}} onClick={ () => setIsFlipped(false) }>
                        <ArrowBackIcon color='secondary' />
                    </IconButton>
                </Container>
            </Card>
        </ReactCardFlip>
    )
}

export default EmployeeCard
